SELECT
, COALESCE(xref.crop_commodity_id, t.crop_commodity_id) AS non_pedigree_crop_commodity_id , CASE WHEN COALESCE(xref.crop_commodity_id, 0) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS is_pedigree_product FROM cuws.product t JOIN policy p on p.policy_id = t.policy_id LEFT JOIN crop_commodity_pedigree_xref xref ON xref.crop_commodity_id_pedigree = t.crop_commodity_id WHERE contract_id = #{contractId} AND crop_year = #{cropYear}
